name: AQUATRIS
description:
AQUATRIS

AQUATRIS is a Tetris game developed for the Mattel Aquarius computer. The game is stored on an 8K cartridge and does not require any additional memory. Due to the limited space available on the cartridge and the computer's memory, sound effects have not been included.

Controls
  • "C" key for moving left
  • "B" key for moving right
  • "V" key for moving down
  • "L"  key to turn the block
  • "P" key for pausing the game
How to Play

Control the falling container-shaped tetrominos on the dock and try to form complete rows to score points. The game becomes faster and more challenging as you progress to higher levels. Can you beat your high score?

You can find the source code on GitHub.
